name: Gutterball - Golden Pin Bowling FREE
description:
This update requires OSX 10.7.3!!!!

☆☆☆ Also available for iPad & iPhone in the iTunes store ☆☆☆

Strike Gold and collect a wide range of bowling balls, awesome alleys and cool power-ups! If you've been searching for a fun bowling game for your Mac, THIS is the game to play!


GUTTERBALL BOWLING HIGHLIGHTS:
☆ It's a true bowling game with dazzling graphics and great pin physics
☆ Clean & crisp throwing action lets you spin your bowling ball perfectly
☆ Collect bonus content with Golden Pins to experience even more bowling fun!
☆ Awesome Power Ups, including a BOMB, a SPLITTER, and the INFLATOR (Arnold approved!)

FEATURES:
☆ 2 beautiful and uniquely fun bowling alley's (5 extra alleys available in the full version.)
☆ Funny commentators who voice their opinion on every bowling throw
☆ House, Style and Effect bowling balls to unlock, each more awesome than the last
☆ Arcade "Spin" system to increase your Golden Pins when bowling like a pro.
☆ Local High Scores and 40 bowling achievements

Check out the Paid version for more content and features not available in the free version.

HISTORY:
The original Gutterball 3D bowling game premiered in 2002. It reached #1 on many portals and stayed in Real Arcade's Top 10 for an unprecedented 54 weeks. Gutterball 2 arrived in 2004 with all-new crazy bowling alley designs, improved grahics and physics, and new features galore. Now, Gutterball: Golden Pin Bowling is all-new and ready to go! We think it's the finest bowling game on the App Store and we've played them all.

You be the judge... is this Gutterball the best bowling game ever?
